alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:19PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 317 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms moving east at 45 mph across far southern portions of Beaverhead and Madison Counties. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Roads will likely become slick, with some ponding of water possible. Locations impacted include... Lima, Monida, Dell, Bannack Pass, Lakeview, Snowline, Red Rock Pass and Raynolds Pass. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 23 . Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. One or more of these storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
